observation: Canton IL CPA  1 Home Firm profile Client services Staff Resources Contact us Account access Careers Hocker, Fitzjarrald & Richardson, PC is a Canton, IL CPA firm. Thank you for visiting our website. Our dedication to quality client service has brought us to the Internet as we endeavor to provide the highest quality professional service and guidance. We've designed this website as a "one-stop shop" to provide information about our firm, our staff and the services we offer. Our website features the following pages, developed to keep you up-to-date and informed: FIRM PROFILE - Visit this page to learn more about the Canton, IL CPA firm's history, personnel & mission statement. CLIENT SERVICES - Find out more about the wide range of services we offer and our various areas of specialization. STAFF - Meet our professional staff. RESOURCES - There are a lot of great web sites out there - if you can find them! Use this page to link to some useful sites that we have found. CONTACT INFORMATION Robert R. Fitzjarrald, CPA, Joshua S. Richardson, CPA; Peggy A. Roberts, CPA; Paula L. Arrenholz; Carla J. Spotser, Tabitha Watson. Website Designed Create a Website List Your Business

thought: The website appears to be a legitimate CPA firm website, with information about the firm, its services, and its staff. It does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. - result: False
